title: my account is Bugged
body: I log into my account and apparently i am in game as Ekko and when the game tries to load it doesn't work I've tried my alt account and that works but mine doesn't mind explaining how to fixed this stupid problem

replies.body: I'm a little confused understanding this specific issue.  Were you intending to join this game as Ekko, or do you believe the account may have been accessed by another user?  If that's the case, I highly recommend going through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide to make sure your info in and out of League is secure!
